name: Drown
tip: Filling up your discard pile, providing Rooster targets, and keeping you from drawing cards you know you don't want - Drown does it all.

name: Dew
tip: Dew provides a reliable source of 1 point every round, but be careful of stuffing you hand too full.

name: Fishing Boat
tip: Honestly try to play Fishing Boat after you shuffle, it's better that way.

name: Gentle Rain
tip: Gentle Rain gets worse if your hand is too full for you to draw cards.

name: Excess
tip: While it forces you to commit hard to a round, Excess is a huge amount of points for the right low-curve deck.

name: Iceberg
tip: You can pass more often if you start a round with priority, or play a high-points card.

name: Gain and Loss
tip: Getting rid of cards you don't want in the matchup, or cards that are too cheap once you get to the late game can help you win with ease.

name: Fish
tip: Fish only triggers at the start of the game if you choose not to mulligan it.

name: Cloud
tip: The Exhale abilities trigger from top to bottom, and multiple can trigger as long as you have enough breath.
